Text: I would upload some books, but I don't know how to.   I can get them uploaded onto Vuze, but I don't know how to put them onto the internet.  If anyone can direct me to some easy instructions, it would be appreciated.
nevermind I figured it out, but still can't seem to see it listed

@rufussondheim

Vuze is one of the clients I use

After you get it on Vuze go to you Pirate Bay Acc and at the bottom of the page click on "upload Torrent" just fill in the required fields.

The first line,where it says "Torrent" browse for torrent file created by Vuze.It will look like the Vuze Icon.That is what you upload to TPB

Keep the book your uploading and the torrent file in the same folder

Let me know if you have any questions

@rufussondheim

It might take a couple of minutes to show up

Hello, would you have Doctor Who "Shada", released earlier this year?  It was written by Douglas Adams. The book was finished by Gareth Roberts, as Adams died in 2001.  
                 thankyou
